text: Those believers who sit (at home) without receiving any injury are not equal to those who strive in the way of God with their wealth and their persons. God has been more gracious to those who strive with their wealth and their persons by (giving them a higher) rank over those who sit (at home), and to each God has promised good but God has been more gracious to those who strive, by giving them a greater reward compared to those who sit (at home)
